entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
